department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch: 光學遙測原理、特性及應用概念之簡介與培育
goal.en: Introduction and construction of the theory, specifics and applications of optical remote sensing

textbook.ch: 1. Grant W. Petty：A First Course In Atmospheric Radiation. 2nd Edition, Sundog publishing, Madison Wisconsin, 2006. 2. Kuo-Nan Liou：An Introduction to Atmospheric Radiation. Academic Press, 1980. 3. John R. Jensen: Remote Sensing of the Environment, Pearson, NJ, 2007.
textbook.en: 1. Grant W. Petty：A First Course In Atmospheric Radiation. 2nd Edition, Sundog publishing, Madison Wisconsin, 2006. 2. Kuo-Nan Liou：An Introduction to Atmospheric Radiation. Academic Press, 1980. 3. John R. Jensen: Remote Sensing of the Environment, Pearson, NJ, 2007.

gradMethod.ch: 1.考試(Exams)：40％; 2.讀書心得報告(Report)：50％; 3.上課互動表現(Class activity)：10％

ch.competencies: 遙測與空間資訊專業能力

en.competencies: Professional competence in remote sensing and geoinformatics
